title: Cinda Williams Chima Seven Realms/Heir Chronicles mobi/epub
description:
Cinda Williams Chima's Seven Realms 01-04 + Heir Chronicles 01-03

Seven Realms:
01-The Demon King
02-The exiled queen
03-The gray wolf throne
04-The crimson crown

Heir Chronicles:
01-The warrior heir
02-The wizare heir
03-The dragon heir

All are in either Mobi/Epub or both, ready to go straight into your kindle or converted into a pdf if you wished to view in your computer.

Metadata/cover images are also there for the seven realms.


I just wanted to upload these Ebooks as a torrent as it took me hours and hours to find all of these separately, and decided to spare the pain of anyone else who happens to be looking for them (really, finding and collecting these were not fun)

Seed if you found this torrent useful in any way, I would appreciate it, I will be seeding this one 24/7 for the foreseeable future, but if somewhere down the track there end up being no seeds and you wish to download, feel free to leave a comment, I will check here regularly.
